title: Cubesats to hitch rides on Artemis 1
summary: The first flight of the Space Launch System will carry along with the Orion spacecraft 10 cubesats intended to carry out missions from prospecting for lunar ice to flying by an asteroid — if they’re not dead on arrival.

title: Rocket Report: At long last the SLS is ready, Alpha gets a launch date
summary: "For the uncrewed demo, the goal is to have a safe landing."

title: China makes progress in reusability with secretive second flight of suborbital spaceplane
summary: China has performed its first repeated use of a suborbital spaceplane as part of efforts to develop a fully reusable space transportation system.

title: Lunar Trailblazer faces NASA review after cost overruns
summary: NASA will decide the future of a lunar smallsat orbiter mission at a review this fall after cost overruns by the spacecraft’s manufacturer.

title: SpaceX, NASA announce date for next Crew Dragon astronaut launch
summary: SpaceX and NASA have settled on October 3rd for the company’s fifth operational astronaut launch, a mission that will also mark the...
